summary: Fixed jq syntax errors in /todo command using Issue #1132-safe patterns (file-based filters, has(), del()). Added interactive CLAUDE.md suggestion selection via AskUserQuestion with multiSelect and auto-application via Edit tool. Updated dry-run and final output sections. Added documentation for interactive CLAUDE.md workflow and jq pattern safety.

artifacts.summary: Updated /todo command specification with jq fixes and interactive CLAUDE.md selection

next_steps: Review implementation and verify /todo command works with actual meta tasks
